---
title: "Winning"
date: "2024-01-13"
categories: [poem]
fields: [date, title]
toc: true
---


if you find a thing <br>
that is so that <br>
<br>
when you have it<br>
you can't keep it<br>
<br>
and <br>
<br>
when you don't have it<br>
you can always get it back<br>
<br>
then this a thing<br>
that is to be avoided<br>
in the beginning<br>



---
